Info.Description: This tool adjusts the intensity and balance of colors in your image. It allows for correction of color cast and enhances the overall tone of your image.

Properties.Name: Red Channel
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the intensity of red hues in your image. Slide towards the positive side to add more red, or towards the negative to reduce red, which will increase cyan.

Properties.Name: Green Channel
Properties.Summary: Modifies the intensity of green hues in your image. Increasing this value adds more green, while decreasing it reduces green, and thus introduces more magenta.

Properties.Name: Blue Channel
Properties.Summary: Changes the intensity of blue hues in your image. A higher value adds more blue, whereas a lower value reduces blue and increases yellow.

Properties.Name: Temperature
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the overall color temperature of the image. Increasing the temperature will make the image appear warmer (more yellow), while decreasing it will make the image look cooler (more blue).

Properties.Name: Tint
Properties.Summary: This setting modifies the global green-magenta balance in the image. Slide towards the positive to add more green, or towards the negative to add more magenta.
